channel.title: Comments on: Layoffs Ahead for Warcraft Raiders

item.title: By: Elbows
item.dc:creator: Elbows
item.description:
Yea I think a lot of people who are trying to defend the raid cap change by saying "Just recruit 10 more people and run two raids!" are being unrealistic. Just trying to run the occasional simultaneous Onyxia raids usually ends in tragedy for the B-team raid.
Can you imagine the drama that trying to maintain two end game raids would create within a guild? It's an almost garaunteed /gdisband.
